siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: A lot happened in 2020. Despite everything, developers coded, learned new stuff, deployed and debugged. Here are a few highlights from a year to remember (or, you know, forget).
blogPost.body: A lot happened in 2020. Despite everything, developers coded, learned new stuff, deployed and debugged. Here are a few highlights from a year to remember (or, you know, forget).
blogPost.title: 2020 Year in Review by CodersRank - How did you code in 2020?
blogPost.author: Tibor Szántai

localize.description: 2020年发生了很多事情。尽管如此，开发人员还是编码、学习新知识、部署和调试。以下是一年中值得记住(或者，你知道，忘记)的一些亮点。
2020年發生了很多事情。儘管如此，開發人員還是編碼、學習新知識、部署和調試。以下是一年中值得記住(或者，你知道，忘記)的一些亮點。

previous.excerpt: Planning to take time off this holiday season? The automatic out-of-office calendar from Clockwise makes it effortless to coordinate with your team. Simply mark your calendar OOO and Clockwise will sync your availability to the shared team calendar.
previous.title: Automatic out-of-office calendar - Just mark your calendar as OOO, we take care of the rest

localize.description: 这个假期你打算请假吗？来自顺时针的自动外出日历使您可以毫不费力地与您的团队进行协调。只需将您的日历标记为OOO，顺时针就会将您的可用性同步到共享的团队日历。
localize.tagline: 只需将您的日历标记为OOO，我们会处理睡觉

localize.description: 這個假期你打算請假嗎？來自順時針的自動外出日曆使您可以毫不費力地與您的團隊進行協調。只需將您的日曆標記爲OOO，順時針就會將您的可用性同步到共享的團隊日曆。
localize.tagline: 只需將您的日曆標記爲OOO，我們會處理睡覺
